metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15469 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x. ARM never properlyimplemented grant table v2, either in the hypervisor or in Linux.Unfortunately, an ARM guest can still request v2 grant tables; they willsimply not be properly set up, resulting in subsequent grant-relatedhypercalls hitting BUG() checks. An unprivileged guest can cause a BUG()check in the hypervisor, resulting in a denial-of-service (crash).

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
